sqlMap.select:
select
e.car_nm, /*차명*/ e.car_body_no, /*차대번호*/ e.car_yy, /*년식*/ e.tot_wg, /*총중량*/ a.sub_unit_tot, /*부속품합계액*/ a.machine_unit_amt, /*기계가액*/ a.top_tank_amt, /*탑및탱크가액*/
a.tukbyul_rate1_cd, /*특별요율1코드*/ f_code_nm('1011',a.tukbyul_rate1_cd) as tukbyul_rate1_nm, a.tukbyul_rate2_cd, /*특별요율2코드*/ f_code_nm('1011',a.tukbyul_rate2_cd) as tukbyul_rate2_nm, a.tukbyul_rate3_cd, /*특별요율3코드*/ f_code_nm('1011',a.tukbyul_rate3_cd) as tukbyul_rate3_nm, a.CAR_AMT , /*자차공제가액 -> 차량가액(분담금계산용)*/ a.sub_unit_tot + a.machine_unit_amt + a.top_tank_amt + a.car_amt as total_car_amt, /*자차공제총가액*/
a.napip_gb_dae1,/*납입구분코드_대인i*/ a.napip_gb_ilban,/*납입구분코드_일반*/
b.bundam_amt, /*분담금액*/
d.agent_nm agent_nm, e.car_gaip_no car_gaip_no, a.gyeyak_no gyeyak_no, d.agent_no agent_no, d.saupjang_seq saupjang_seq, d.gyeyak_jibu_cd gyeyak_jibu_cd, d.saupja_no saupja_no, decode(trim(e.car_no), null, e.car_body_no, e.car_no) car_no, f_code_nm('1056', e.car_kind_cd) car_kind_nm,/* 차종 */ e.proper_wg proper_wg, b.dambo_kind_cd dambo_kind_cd, f_code_nm('1008', b.dambo_kind_cd) dambo_kind_nm, decode(b.dambo_kind_cd, '1', '', '2', decode(a.tukbyul_dae2_rate, '100', '', a.tukbyul_dae2_rate), '3', decode(a.tukbyul_daemul_rate, '100', '', a.tukbyul_daemul_rate), '4', decode(a.tukbyul_cha_rate, '100', '', a.tukbyul_cha_rate)) tukbyul_rate, decode(b.dambo_kind_cd, '1', '자배법에서 정한 금액', '2', '무한', '3', '1사고당 '||f_code_nm('1010', b.dambo_hando_cd), '4', (select f_code_nm('1013', MYUNCHAEK_CD) from ctgy01 where gyeyak_no = b.gyeyak_no), '8', f_code_nm('1009', b.dambo_hando_cd), '9', decode(substr(trim(b.dambo_hando_cd),1,1), '1', '긴급출동서비스 특약Ⅰ','2','긴급출동서비스 특약Ⅱ', '')) dambo_hando, f_code_nm('1004', b.gyeyak_state_cd) gyeyak_state_nm, b.napip_gb_cd napip_gb_cd, /*납입구분코드*/ trim(b.bunnap_cnt) || '회 / ' || trim(b.napip_gb_cd) || '회' napip_gb, a.gyeyak_eymd gyeyak_eymd, substr(b.dambo_gaip_symd, 1, 4) || '.' || substr(b.dambo_gaip_symd, 5, 2) || '.' || substr(b.dambo_gaip_symd, 7, 2) || '~' || substr(b.dambo_gaip_eymd, 1, 4) || '.' || substr(b.dambo_gaip_eymd, 5, 2) || '.' || substr(b.dambo_gaip_eymd, 7, 2) dambo_gaip_ymd, substr(c.yuhyo_symd, 1, 4) || '.' || substr(c.yuhyo_symd, 5, 2) || '.' || substr(c.yuhyo_symd, 7, 2) || '~' || substr(c.yuhyo_eymd, 1, 4) || '.' || substr(c.yuhyo_eymd, 5, 2) || '.' || substr(c.yuhyo_eymd, 7, 2) yuhyo_ymd, (case when b.bunnap_cnt = b.napip_gb_cd then '' else (select x.yuhyo_symd from ctgy03 x where x.gyeyak_no = c.gyeyak_no and x.dambo_kind_cd = c.dambo_kind_cd and x.bunnap_cnt = c.bunnap_cnt + '1') end) next_bunnap_ymd, (case when b.bunnap_cnt = b.napip_gb_cd then 0 else (select y.bunnap_amt from ctgy03 y where y.gyeyak_no = c.gyeyak_no and y.dambo_kind_cd = c.dambo_kind_cd and y.bunnap_cnt = c.bunnap_cnt + '1') end) next_bunnap_amt, 0 cnt, '클릭' bosang, 0 bosang_chk, f.carmgr_nm as carmgr_nm, trim(replace(f.mobile_com_no||f.mobile_no,' ','')) as carmgr_phone, PYOJUN_DAE1_RATE DAE1, PYOJUN_ILBAN_RATE ILBAN, TUKBYUL_ADD_RATE TUKBYUL
from ctgy01 a, ctgy02 b, ctgy03 c, ctgi01 d, ctgi05 e, ctgi06 f where ((#agentcd# = '1' and d.saupja_no = #saupja_no# and d.gyeyak_jibu_cd like #gyeyak_jibu_cd#) or (#agentcd# <> '1' and d.agent_no = #agent_no# and d.saupjang_seq = #saupjang_seq#)) and d.agent_no = e.agent_no and d.saupjang_seq = e.saupjang_seq and ((#agentcd# = '1' and trim(e.carmgr_jumin_no) is null) or e.carmgr_jumin_no like #jumin_no#) and e.car_gaip_no = a.car_gaip_no and e.carmgr_jumin_no = f.carmgr_jumin_no(+) /*and a.gyeyak_state_cd in ( '1', '2', '5' )*/ and a.gyeyak_state_cd != '8' /* and a.gyeyak_symd = ( select max(temp.gyeyak_symd) from ctgy01 temp where temp.car_gaip_no = a.car_gaip_no ) 가장 최신 계약 */ and a.gyeyak_no = b.gyeyak_no and b.gyeyak_no = c.gyeyak_no and b.dambo_kind_cd = c.dambo_kind_cd and b.bunnap_cnt = c.bunnap_cnt
and a.car_gaip_no = #car_gaip_no# and a.gyeyak_no = #gyeyak_no# order by e.car_no, b.gyeyak_no desc, b.dambo_kind_cd

select decode(trim(x.car_no), null, x.car_body_no, x.car_no) car_no, x.gyeyak_no, f_code_nm('1008', x.dambo_kind_cd) dambo_kind_nm, f_code_nm('1004', x.gyeyak_state_cd) gyeyak_state_nm, x.bunnap_amt1, x.youngsu_ymd1, x.bunnap_amt2, x.youngsu_ymd2, x.bunnap_amt3, x.youngsu_ymd3, x.bunnap_amt4, x.youngsu_ymd4, x.bunnap_amt5, x.youngsu_ymd5, x.bunnap_amt6, x.youngsu_ymd6, x.dambo_kind_cd, x.gyeyak_state_cd from ( select a1.car_no car_no, a1.car_body_no car_body_no, d1.gyeyak_no gyeyak_no, d1.dambo_kind_cd dambo_kind_cd, max(c1.gyeyak_state_cd) gyeyak_state_cd,
max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '1', d1.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd1, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '1', d1.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd1, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '1', d1.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt1, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '1', d1.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd1,
max(case when b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2' then d1.yuhyo_symd else '' end ) yuhyo_symd2, max(case when b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2' then d1.yuhyo_eymd else '' end ) yuhyo_eymd2, max(case when b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2' then d1.bunnap_amt else 0 end ) bunnap_amt2, max(case when b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2' then d1.youngsu_ymd else '' end ) youngsu_ymd2,
max(case when ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '3') or ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = '2' and b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN = '4' and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2') then d1.yuhyo_symd else '' end ) yuhyo_symd3, max(case when ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '3') or ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = '2' and b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN = '4' and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2') then d1.yuhyo_eymd else '' end ) yuhyo_eymd3, max(case when ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '3') or ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = '2' and b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN = '4' and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2') then d1.bunnap_amt else 0 end ) bunnap_amt3, max(case when ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '3') or ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = '2' and b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN = '4' and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2') then d1.youngsu_ymd else '' end ) youngsu_ymd3, max(case when ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '4') or ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = '2' and b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN = '6' and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2') then d1.yuhyo_symd else '' end ) yuhyo_symd4, max(case when ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '4') or ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = '2' and b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN = '6' and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2') then d1.yuhyo_eymd else '' end ) yuhyo_eymd4, max(case when ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '4') or ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = '2' and b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN = '6' and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2') then d1.bunnap_amt else 0 end ) bunnap_amt4, max(case when ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN and d1.bunnap_cnt = '4') or ( b1.NAPIP_GB_DAE1 = '2' and b1.NAPIP_GB_ILBAN = '6' and d1.bunnap_cnt = '2') then d1.youngsu_ymd else '' end ) youngsu_ymd4,
max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '5', d1.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd5, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '5', d1.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd5, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '5', d1.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt5, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '5', d1.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd5, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '6', d1.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd6, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '6', d1.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd6, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '6', d1.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt6, max(decode(d1.bunnap_cnt, '6', d1.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd6
from ctgi05 a1, ctgy01 b1, ctgy02 c1, ctgy03 d1
where a1.car_gaip_no = #car_gaip_no# and d1.gyeyak_no = #gyeyak_no# and a1.car_gaip_no = b1.car_gaip_no /*and b1.gyeyak_state_cd in ('1', '2', '5')*/ and b1.gyeyak_state_cd != '5' /* and b1.gyeyak_symd = ( select max(temp.gyeyak_symd) from ctgy01 temp where temp.car_gaip_no = a1.car_gaip_no ) 가장 최신 계약 */ and b1.gyeyak_no = c1.gyeyak_no and c1.gyeyak_no = d1.gyeyak_no and c1.dambo_kind_cd = '1' and c1.dambo_kind_cd = d1.dambo_kind_cd
group by a1.car_no, a1.car_body_no, d1.gyeyak_no, d1.dambo_kind_cd
union all
select a2.car_no car_no, a2.car_body_no car_body_no, d2.gyeyak_no gyeyak_no, d2.dambo_kind_cd dambo_kind_cd, max(c2.gyeyak_state_cd) gyeyak_state_cd,
max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '1', d2.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd1, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '1', d2.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd1, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '1', d2.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt1, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '1', d2.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd1,
max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '2', d2.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd2, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '2', d2.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd2, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '2', d2.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt2, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '2', d2.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd2,
max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '3', d2.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd3, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '3', d2.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd3, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '3', d2.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt3, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '3', d2.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd3,
max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '4', d2.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd4, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '4', d2.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd4, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '4', d2.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt4, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '4', d2.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd4,
max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '5', d2.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd5, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '5', d2.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd5, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '5', d2.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt5, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '5', d2.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd5,
max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '6', d2.yuhyo_symd, '')) yuhyo_symd6, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '6', d2.yuhyo_eymd, '')) yuhyo_eymd6, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '6', d2.bunnap_amt, 0)) bunnap_amt6, max(decode(d2.bunnap_cnt, '6', d2.youngsu_ymd, '')) youngsu_ymd6 from ctgi05 a2, ctgy01 b2, ctgy02 c2, ctgy03 d2 where a2.car_gaip_no = #car_gaip_no# and d2.gyeyak_no = #gyeyak_no# and a2.car_gaip_no = b2.car_gaip_no /*and b2.gyeyak_state_cd in ('1', '2', '5')*/
and b2.gyeyak_state_cd != '5' /* and b2.gyeyak_symd = ( select max(temp.gyeyak_symd) from ctgy01 temp where temp.car_gaip_no = a2.car_gaip_no ) 가장 최신 계약 */
and b2.gyeyak_no = c2.gyeyak_no and c2.gyeyak_no = d2.gyeyak_no and c2.dambo_kind_cd != '1' and c2.dambo_kind_cd = d2.dambo_kind_cd group by a2.car_no, a2.car_body_no, d2.gyeyak_no, d2.dambo_kind_cd ) x order by x.car_no, x.gyeyak_no desc, x.dambo_kind_cd
select count(*) from ctgi06 where CARMGR_JUMIN_NO =#jumin1#||#jumin2#
sqlMap.update: update ctgi05 set CARMGR_JUMIN_NO = #jumin1#||#jumin2# where car_gaip_no =#car_gaip_no#
